**1.2 "Licensor"** means animelook.net and the individual developers who own or control rights to the Software.
**1.3 "You" / "Licensee"** means any individual or entity exercising rights under this License.
**1.4 "Community Project"** means a non‑profit, volunteer, educational, research, or open community initiative operated without commercial advantage or revenue dependence.
**1.5 "Personal Use"** means use by a natural person for private, non‑commercial purposes.
**1.6 "Commercial Use"** means any use intended for, connected to, or resulting in revenue, consideration, or commercial advantage, including (without limitation) sales, paid licensing, renting, paid support, paid hosting/SaaS, ad‑supported distribution or services, paid placement, sponsorships tied to access or features, or use by/for a for‑profit business purpose.
**1.7 "Derivative Work"** means any work based upon or incorporating the Software, including modifications, translations, adaptations, or combinations.
**1.8 "Distribution"** means any making available of the Software or Derivative Works to third parties, including hosting for download or access.
**1.9 "Retained Name Requirement"** means the obligation to retain the name **AnimeLook** prominently in the name and user‑facing branding of the Software and any Derivative Works, as specified in Section 3.
